TopicTitle: KSP Interstellar - Can't get nuclear reactors to work? Can't power warp drive.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I've watched a few videos on how to power warp drives and I've built a generator on top of a fusion reactor and neither of them seem to do anything. Any help would be appreciated helping me figure out how to start producing power, thanks!

Picture of my current craft (Simple to test warp drive functionality)
